entry.title: WIND WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 80.5 km
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:09 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 at times late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:09 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:09 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
